meanings.definition: The sound made by cattle or other animals
meanings.sent1: The lowings of the cows echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent2: I heard the lowings of the animals as I walked through the farm.
meanings.sent3: The lowings of the cows seemed to be their way of saying hello.
meanings.sent4: The lowings of the animals filled the air like a gentle melody.
meanings.sent5: The lowings of the cattle were a soothing background noise.

meanings.definition: The act of making a lowing sound
meanings.sent1: His imitation of the lowings was quite accurate.
meanings.sent2: The lowings could be heard from a distance.
meanings.sent3: She burst into lowings of laughter at the silly joke.
meanings.sent4: The lowings of the children playing in the park were music to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The lowings of the animals added a touch of charm to the countryside.
